# PyVenv
---
> A minimalist python environment manager.
```

 ____      __     __              
|  _ \ _   \ \   / /__ _ ____   __
| |_) | | | \ \ / / _ \ '_ \ \ / /
|  __/| |_| |\ V /  __/ | | \ V / 
|_|    \__, | \_/ \___|_| |_|\_/  
       |___/                      

help: pyvenv <command> [arguments]

Global Options:
    -h, --help               Show this help message and exit.
    
Commands:
    
    create                   Create a new environment.
        Options: pyvenv create <environment name>

    remove                   Delete an environment.
        Options: pyvenv remove <environment name>

    shell                    Activate an environment.
        Options: pyvenv activate <environment name>


```
